message:
转自官推，大概ns pro要来了

This is Furukawa, President of Nintendo. We will make an announcement about the successor to Nintendo Switch within this fiscal year. It will have been over nine years since we announced the existence of Nintendo Switch back in March 2015. We will be holding a Nintendo Direct this June regarding the Nintendo Switch software lineup for the latter half of 2024, but please be aware that there will be no mention of the Nintendo Switch successor during that presentation.

这是任天堂总裁古川。我们将在本财年内宣布Nintendo Switch的继任者。自 2015 年 3 月我们宣布 Nintendo Switch 的存在以来，已经过去了九年多。我们将于今年 6 月就 2024 年下半年的 Nintendo Switch 软件阵容举行 Nintendo Direct，但请注意，在该演示中不会提及 Nintendo Switch 的继任者。
title: 任天堂switch最新消息
userSign: (你的善良和恶毒都不够纯粹所以痛苦)
